alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Jones; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Baldwin, southwestern Putnam and Jones Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Blountsville, or 7 miles north of Gray, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Gray, Midway-Hardwick, Ethridge, Postell, James, Bradley, Wayside, Allenwood, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Haddock, Resseaus Crossroads, Round Oak, Pancras, Greenberry Crossroads, Clinton, Scottsboro, Browns Crossing and Stanfordville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
